description: Test cases for creating and proposing new sports sessions

test_cases.name: Access Propose Session Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Propose Session screen displayed with sport selection, time, and player count options

test_cases.name: Select Sport Type - Badminton
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Badminton is selected and visually highlighted

test_cases.name: Select Sport Type - Tennis
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Tennis is selected and visually highlighted

test_cases.name: Select Sport Type - Futsal
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Futsal is selected and visually highlighted

test_cases.name: Select Sport Type - Ping Pong
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Ping Pong is selected and visually highlighted

test_cases.name: Select Date and Time Window
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
steps: Select preferred date and time window
test_cases.expected_result: Date picker/time selector opens, selected time displayed in field

test_cases.name: Select Players Needed - 2 Players
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen

test_cases.name: Select Players Needed - 4 Players (Default)
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen

test_cases.name: Select Players Needed - 6 Players
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen

test_cases.name: Select Players Needed - 8 Players
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen

test_cases.name: Successfully Propose Session
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Session created, user navigated to Session Lobby (session-wait) screen

test_cases.name: Cancel Propose Session
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen without creating session

test_cases.name: Navigate Back from Propose Session
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen

test_cases.name: Propose Session Without Sport Selection
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error indicating sport selection required

test_cases.name: Propose Session Without Time Selection
preconditions: User is on Propose Session screen
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error indicating time selection required
